event_data.description: Fridge not getting cold, needs assistance.

data.summary: Fridge not getting cold, needs assistance.

emails.content:
Subject: Maintenance Request Summary - Urgent Attention Needed

Dear [Property Manager's Name],

I am writing to bring to your attention a maintenance request that requires urgent action. The details are as follows:

- Event Type: Maintenance Request
- Property/Unit: Unknown
- Repair Type: Appliance
- Urgency: Routine
- Description: Fridge not getting cold, needs assistance.

Please advise on the next steps to address this issue promptly. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Property Management Assistant

Subject: Request for Availability for Appliance Repair Consultation

Dear Maintenance Company,

I am writing on behalf of [Property/Unit: Unknown] to request your assistance with a routine appliance repair. The issue pertains to a fridge that is not getting cold and requires immediate attention.

Could you please provide the available times for your team to come inspect the problem and provide a consultation? We are looking to address this issue promptly to ensure the proper functioning of the appliance.

Your prompt response with available times would be greatly appreciated. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Your Contact Information]

Subject: Maintenance Visit Scheduled for Fridge Repair

Dear Tenant,

I hope this message finds you well. 

We wanted to inform you that a maintenance visit has been scheduled to address the issue with your fridge not getting cold. A maintenance company will be reaching out to you shortly to coordinate a time to visit your unit and assess the problem.

Please be on the lookout for their call or email so that the issue can be resolved promptly. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Property Management Assistant
